tools.name: getMessages
tools.description: Retrieve Microsoft 365 Message Center messages from Microsoft Graph (admin/serviceAnnouncement/messages).

orderby.description: Order by clause for sorting results. Defaults to newest messages first (lastModifiedDateTime desc)

count.description: Include total count of items in response

prefer.description: Specifies the maximum number of items to return in a result set

top.description: Number of records to return. Set to 0 to retrieve only the count (@odata.count) without any message data.

accessToken.description: Optional: Graph access token for proxying requests. Use only for local testing.
